Where should I write that blacklist for mechjeb? On the ship save or in a different global file?

2 hours ago, kerbarara said:

Where should I write that blacklist for mechjeb? On the ship save or in a different global file?

Install ModuleManger, create a MechjebSas.cfg in gamedata and put this in it : 

@PART[*]:HAS[@MODULE[ModuleCommand]]:Final
MODULE
{ 
	%blacklist = MechJebModuleLandingAutopilot MechJebModuleAscentAutopilot MechJebModuleAscentGuidance MechJebModuleAscentNavBall MechJebModuleAscentPathEditor MechJebModuleDockingAutopilot MechJebModuleDockingGuidance MechJebModuleLandingGuidance MechJebModuleLandingPredictions MechJebModuleRCSBalancer MechJebModuleRendezvousAutopilot MechJebModuleRendezvousAutopilotWindow MechJebModuleRoverController MechJebModuleRendezvousGuidance MechJebModuleRoverWindow MechJebModuleSpaceplaneAutopilot MechJebModuleSpaceplaneGuidance
}

It should disable most of the module
